ingredients.ingredient: mini chocolate chips or bittersweet chocolate, finely chopped
chipotle chiles (for chipotle paste—see note) (1 ounce, or 28g)
M&Ms, or other candy-coated chocolate pieces
natural unsweetened pecan butter, at room temperature
Sprinkles or colored sugar, for decorating
egg whites (150 milliliters), at room temperature
Choice of filling: chocolate ganache, white chocolate ganache, salted caramel filling, or jam
jaggery powder or dark brown sugar

recipes.name: dorie greenspan s do almost anything vanilla cookie dough

ingredients.ingredient: unsalted butter, cut into chunks, at room temperature
buckwheat flour, plus more for surface
strong espresso or strong coffee, room temperature
chocolate chunks (I like a mixture of milk and dark chocolate)
2 teaspoon peppermint extract (or more/less depending on your taste)
unsalted butter, cubed, frozen for 15 minutes
crisp, tart apples (such as Braeburn, Stayman Winesap, or Granny Smith)
Buttermilk (or milk or cream), for brushing

recipes.name: ovenly s secretly vegan salted chocolate chip cookies

ingredients.ingredient: dark chocolate chips (we prefer chocolate with 60 percent cocoa content or higher—double-check the ingredients if you want to make sure they're vegan)
packed light or dark brown sugar (note: on photo shoot day, we used an especially dark vegan brown sugar)
plus 1 tablespoon canola, grapeseed, or any other neutral oil
Coarse-grained sea salt or flaky sea salt like Maldon, for garnish
unbleached all-purpose flour, more for baking sheet

recipes.name: kristens genius family banana bread recipe

ingredients.ingredient: unsalted butter, melted, plus more for buttering the pans
ripe large bananas (frozen and thawed work great)
chopped dark chocolate or chocolate chips (optional)
chopped nuts, such as walnuts or pecans (optional)
Turbinado or other sugar for sprinkling on top (optional)

recipes.name: pierre herme dorie greenspan s world peace cookies

ingredients.ingredient: plus 3 tablespoons (150 grams) unsalted butter, room temperature
fleur del sel or 1/4 teaspoon fine sea salt
bittersweet chocolate, chopped into chips (no pieces larger than 1/3 inch), or a generous 3/4 cup store-bought mini chocolate chips

recipes.name: soft yogurt cookies with raspberry glaze

ingredients.ingredient: rainbow sprinkles and/or crushed toasted pistachios, for decorating
regular or raw sugar, for sprinkling

recipes.name: danish butter cookie with currants recipe

ingredients.ingredient: 1/2  teaspoon almond extract (use less if you don't love a strong almond flavor)
smooth apricot or raspberry jam (or 3 ounces/85 grams of each)
4½ ounce (127 grams/¾ cup) chopped bittersweet chocolate or chocolate chips (70% to 82% preferably)

recipes.name: miso peanut butter cookies black sesame chocolate recipe

ingredients.ingredient: very strong brewed coffee, with extra to use
coarsely ground coffee (I use a dark roast)
Unsalted butter, for greasing the baking sheets
freeze-dried raspberries, blitzed to a powder
all-purpose flour, plus more for rolling
light or dark brown sugar, tightly packed

recipes.name: aunt lollys oatmeal chocolate chip cookie recipe
strawberry white chocolate macadamia nut milk chocolate cookie recipe

ingredients.ingredient: dehydrated strawberries, crushed into bite-sized pieces
wafer sandwich cookies, filling removed and crushed into 1/2-inch/1.2-cm pieces (gluten-free, if desired)
mini pretzels, crushed into 1/2-inch pieces (gluten-free if desired), optional
kosher salt, plus more to taste

recipes.name: rose levy beranbaum s molasses sugar butter cookies

ingredients.ingredient: or 10 1/2 tablespoons (1 stick plus 2 1/2 tablespoons) unsalted butter
or 2 tablespoons plus 1 teaspoon (35 ml) or 3/4 large egg
or 1 3/4 cups minus 1 tablespoon (lightly spooned into the cup and leveled off) bleached all-purpose flour
or 1/2 cup plus 2 tablespoons superfine sugar
or 3 tablespoons (45 ml) light molasses, preferably Grandma’s brand
or 2 tablespoons superfine sugar, for rolling the dough balls (see Baking Pearls)
cocoa powder (I like dark or black cocoa powder for these)

recipes.name: best applesauce chocolate chip cookies recipe

ingredients.ingredient: 1½ cup (heaping) bitter- or semisweet chocolate chips or chunks (I used 64% cacao), plus more for sprinkling

recipes.name: best butter cookies recipe with fruit

ingredients.ingredient: neutral oil, such as coconut or vegetable

recipes.name: vegan dark chocolate gingerbread thumbprint cookies

ingredients.ingredient: –inch piece of ginger, peeled and sliced into coins about 1/8-inch thick
4.2 ounce Hu Simple Dark Chocolate (2 bars), roughly chopped into shards

recipes.name: pan banging chocolate chip cookies recipe adaptation

ingredients.ingredient: packed light or dark brown sugar
bittersweet chocolate, chopped (some chunks, some shards)
Flaky salt, to sprinkle on top (optional)
room temperature Earth Balance buttery sticks
organic cane sugar (or 1 1/2 cups organic confectioners' sugar—see headnote)
Ener-G egg replacer, mixed with 2 tablespoons hot water
all-purpose flour, plus extra for dusting and rolling

recipes.name: olive oil sugar cookies recipe with pistachios lemon

ingredients.ingredient: whole pistachios, plus 1/3 cup chopped (33g) for sprinkling
unsalted butter, melted and slightly cooled
pure vanilla extract (available kosher for Passover)
fleur de sel or other large-flake sea salt

recipes.name: peanut butter chocolate chocolate chip cookies recipe

ingredients.ingredient: black cocoa powder (you can use all regular cocoa if you prefer; this will just give a more intense color)

recipes.name: chewy chocolate chip cookies with rainbow fennel seeds

ingredients.ingredient: unsalted butter, absolutely at room temperature
unsalted butter, at room temperature (we recommend using Land O'Lakes)
cocoa powder (preferably dark or black cocoa powder)
butter (12 tablespoons, or 1 1/2 sticks), at room temperature
well-mashed very ripe banana (from about 2 1/2 large bananas)
dark and milk chocolate chunks (or chopped chocolate bars)

recipes.name: kitchen sink cookies recipe gaby dalkin

ingredients.ingredient: old-fashioned oats, pulverized in a blender for 30 seconds until smooth
vinegar (any kind will do, like red, white, rice, and apple cider; just not balsamic)
Vanilla Sablé Tart Shell dough (see Author Notes)
plus 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon (or to taste)
all-purpose flour, plus 1/4 cup (30 grams) as needed
1 1/2 cups nuts (210 grams almond or hazelnuts, 150 grams pecans or walnuts, 170 grams peanuts, 190 grams macadamias, 255 grams pistachios)
unsalted butter, softened and cut into small chunks
bean, seeds scraped out (or 1 t vanilla bean paste or vanilla extract)

recipes.name: my family recipe mom moms potato chip cookie
